name: Carl Unegbu

jv_history.partner_name: Einer meiner viralsten Posts auf LinkedIn - 5 Monate später.
jv_history.source_quote: Einer meiner viralsten Posts auf LinkedIn - 5 Monate später. ... Für mich stehen jetzt noch OMR, Founder Summit und unser exklusive Kundenevent in Hamburg mit Christian Wolf an. ... Weitere Kommentare

what_you_do: Carl Unegbu is a lawyer in Manhattan, New York who also writes and edits comedy-related content, operating his law practice through O'Carl's Law.
social_proof: Author of 'Comedy Under Attack: The Golden Age and the Headwinds' and 'Comedy Goes to Court: When People Stop Laughing and Start Fighting'; former law clerk at the International Court of Arbitration in Paris; admitted to the New York Bar after practicing law in Miami.
signature_programs: Comedy Under Attack: The Golden Age and the Headwinds (book); Comedy Goes to Court: When People Stop Laughing and Start Fighting (book)
business_focus: Legal practice in Manhattan combined with writing and commentary on comedy and law intersections.
service_provided: legal services, comedy writing, comedy editing
